billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

title: Makes it a discriminatory practice for public employers to compensate employees of different sexes differently for work that is of comparable worth
summary: Makes it a discriminatory practice for public employers to compensate employees of different sexes differently for work that is of comparable worth; makes exception for seniority system; prohibits reducing anyone's compensation to conform with this provision; provides three years for a compliance plan.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to making it a discriminatory practice for public employers to compensate employees of different sexes differently for work that is of comparable worth
